remarks: If two pairs of numbers are componentwise congruent, so are their products.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Oct-2014.)
statement: congmul $p |- ( ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ /\ C e. ZZ ) /\ ( D e. ZZ /\ E e. ZZ ) /\ ( A || ( B - C ) /\ A || ( D - E ) ) ) -> A || ( ( B x. D ) - ( C x. E ) ) ) $.
